title: Live recorder software - CreativeLive
description:
As i am, I know there are a ton of people interested in CreativeLive Courses over here, and there's none they(you) wanna miss.

This piece of software will help us to record the live courses

## without having to record the screen and make our computer useless while recording the live courses ##

As I can not afford to buy the courses (i live in a poor country where dolar is too expensive for us.) and my internet connection is a load of crap, I'm sharing this information so hopefully most of the people can record the live event and share with others that, like me, can not have them.


#### WHERE TO DOWNLOAD THE STUFF: ####

LIVESTREAMER: <a href="
http://livestreamer.tanuki.se/en" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://livestreamer.tanuki.se/en</a> - Oficial website <a href="
https://github.com/chrippa/livestreamer/releases" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://github.com/chrippa/livestreamer/releases</a> - Github

VLC Player <a href="
http://www.videolan.org/vlc/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.videolan.org/vlc/</a>

[PC] I PERSONALLY DO NOT USE THE INSTALLER.
I DOWNLOAD THE ZIP FOLDER AND OPEN A COMMAND WINDOW ON THAT FOLDER
(Inside the folder: shift + right click > Open command window here)

 <a href="
http://i.imgur.com/vmjYk9B.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://i.imgur.com/vmjYk9B.png</a>


(it will make you feel like a hacker! hory shet!)


PLEASE READ THE SITE IF YOU WANNA REALLY LEARN THIS THING.(cuz i know nothing.)

____________________________________


To play using VLC: (PC)
Inside the folder: shift + right click > Open command window here. CMD window will pop up, then type:
livestreamer USTREAM-URL-HERE best --player-no-close

If you want, you can tell livestreamer to write to a file: (PC)
livestreamer USTREAM-URL-HERE best -o C:/PATH-TO-YOUR-FOLDER


THERE ARE A LOT MORE COMMANDS AVAILABLE FOR THIS SOFTWARE.
PLEASE READ THE SITE IF YOU WANNA REALLY LEARN THIS THING.(cuz i know nothing.)

________________________________________


If you want, you can tell livestreamer to write to a file:
livestreamer USTREAM-URL-HERE best -o C:/PATH-TO-YOUR-FOLDER


THERE ARE A LOT MORE COMMANDS AVAILABLE FOR THIS SOFTWARE.
PLEASE READ THE SITE IF YOU WANNA REALLY LEARN THIS THING.(cuz i know nothing.)


_________________________________________


This software wasn't meant to record CreativeLive courses, the specs and uses is on their website.
